overview: Sriram may appreciate challenges and often enjoys taking the lead to produce results.
Sriram tends to be methodical but aggressive towards goals with a preference for efficiency.
Sriram likely are eager to challenge others with high expectations.
Sriram tends to be confident and fast-paced, especially when achieving ambitious goals.
Sriram may come off as very direct sometimes, and are likely most comfortable taking control.

do: Highlight competitive advantages of your product

dont: Don't sugarcoat or use vague, overly-optimistic language to describe the value of your product
Don't take their schedule lightly; respect the call's length and end on-schedule
Don't be overly friendly; be assertive and push back when you need to
